current_blocker.description: Appliances on v1.0.49 crash processing update orders (missing mcp_api_key_file). Fix is in v1.0.52 but they need update to get it.
current_blocker.solution: SSH to iMac gateway, then to VM appliance, manually patch files
commands: # Patch appliance_agent.py and evidence.py with getattr() fix

completed_this_session: Removed dry_run mode from all configs (production mode default)
Added circuit breaker for healing loops (5 attempts, 30min cooldown)
Created context engineering strategy based on Anthropic research

recent_commits.message: fix: Remove dry_run mode and add circuit breaker for healing loops

quick_commands.appliance_status: ssh root@178.156.162.116 "docker exec mcp-postgres psql -U mcp -d mcp -c 'SELECT site_id, agent_version, last_checkin FROM appliances ORDER BY last_checkin DESC'"
